title: PIMCO's Clarida on Rate Hike: Fed Should Get On With It (Audio)
itunes:title: PIMCO's Clarida on Rate Hike: Fed Should Get On With It (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: FED IN FOCUS: Richard Clarida, Global Strategic Adviser at Pimco, on the Fed's rate hiking path, and the Bank of Japan.
